bike.description: Kris Fox Signature Model, 100% Cr-Mo, Double-Butted Main Frame, Integrated Seat Clamp, Integrated Head Tube, Externally Machined Mid-BB, Removable Cable Guides & Brake Mounts

components.description: Full Cr-Mo, Tapered Legs, 3/8" Dropouts w/ 32mm Offset
3-pc Cr-Mo, 175mm, Closed-End Invisibolt, Mid-Sealed Bearing, 25T Alloy SE Bubble Sprocket
SE Alloy 36H 3/8" Female F & 14mm Female Semi-Sealed R Hubs w/ Alienation Deviant F & Alienation 440 R Double-wall Rims, 9T Driver
Demolition Machete 20" x 2.25" F, Demolition Momentum 20" x 2.20" R
Tektro FX340R, U-Brake, Linear Pull, Soft-Compound Shoes
SE Top-Load Alloy, Lightweight External Cutouts, Hidden Top Cap
SE DSP Grip w/ Rubber SE End Plugs
